item.title: Querying GitHub release data with gh and jq
item.description: A demo of semi-advanced gh CLI and jq querying techniques. Problem You’d like to fetch a JSON array listing the latest patch release associated with each of the latest 5 minor versions of Grafana. Solution Leverage that… Grafana releases are published as GitHub releases The gh CLI’s support for a api command, enabling users to query GitHub API endpoints The GitHub API’s support for a list releases endpoint gh api’s support for a --jq flag, enabling the ability to invoke jq queries against GitHub API responses For example:
